title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1beta2\CreateAutoscalingPolicyRequest
name: CreateAutoscalingPolicyRequest
description:
A request to create an autoscaling policy.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1beta2.CreateAutoscalingPolicyRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The "resource name" of the region or location, as described in https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names. For projects.regions.autoscalingPolicies.create, the resource name has the following format: projects/{project_id}/regions/{region} For projects.locations.autoscalingPolicies.create, the resource name has the following format: projects/{project_id}/locations/{location}
